com.preemptive.annotation.instrumentation

Annotation Type AddUncaughtExceptionHandler


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
@Target(value={CONSTRUCTOR,METHOD})
public @interface AddUncaughtExceptionHandler
    Add an global or thread specific exception handler.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean showDialog
      Should the exception dialog be shown.
      boolean thread
      Should the handler be installed as the global handler or only for the current thread.
      InjectionPoint where
      The location in the method where instrumentation will take place.

    • Element Detail

      • showDialog

        public abstract boolean showDialog
        Should the exception dialog be shown. By default the dialog is not shown.
        Default:
        false

      • thread

        public abstract boolean thread
        Should the handler be installed as the global handler or only for the current thread. The default is to install a global handler.
        Default:
        false

      • where

        public abstract InjectionPoint where
        The location in the method where instrumentation will take place.
        Default:
        com.preemptive.annotation.instrumentation.InjectionPoint.Beginning
